attributes.action: Request removal of non-relevant cigarette packet images such as needles.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst the undersigned are aware that cigarette packages must now contain picture health warning images from the 1st October 2008, we fail to see the need for sensationalist images such as a syringe containing a cigarette.
The condition needlephobia affects 10% of the population, and in some cases can be severe and crippling.
We ask that the needle images, and others not directly linked to smoking, its effects and related diseases be removed or redesigned.
Risks include car accidents, and collapse in possibly dangerous situations, and sometimes vasovagal reflex reaction which can be fatal.
